metadata.description: "Extrait du registre des délibérations des assemblées générales des actionnaires de la Caisse d'escompte, du 29 décembre 1789"--4 p. at end
metadata.notes: No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found. Title page and cover are combined. Damaged, stained and/or loose pages. Uneven binding. Skewed text. Irregular pagination.
